course_title: Special Topics: Cross-listed: Film and the Holocaust
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 10 / Seats Avail: 10Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as REL 270 2 and JS 273 2)
This course satisfies the Religion major requirement Theme. 
This course, we will use moving images as primary sources for studying the Holocaust and its representations. We will examine materials ranging from amateur home movies depicting the prewar daily Jewish life, Nazi propaganda films, and liberation footage to postwar survivor video testimonies and Hollywood blockbusters.
course_description: Selected topics in history for students in non-history originating (cross-listed) courses. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
